Name: Toggle Group
Description: A set of two-state buttons that can be toggled on or off.

SubComponentData.Name: Root
SubComponentData.Description: Contains all the parts of a toggle group.

PropData.Name: asChild
PropData.Description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.  Read our Composition guide for more details.

PropData.Name: value
PropData.Description: Determines whether a single or multiple items can be pressed at a time.

PropData.Name: defaultValue
PropData.Description: The value of the item to show as pressed when initially rendered and type is "single". Use when you do not need to control the state of the items.

PropData.Name: onValueChange
PropData.Description: Event handler called when the pressed state of an item changes and type is "single".

PropData.Name: value
PropData.Description: Event handler called when the pressed state of an item changes and type is "single".

PropData.Name: defaultValue
PropData.Description: The values of the items to show as pressed when initially rendered and type is "multiple". Use when you do not need to control the state of the items.

PropData.Name: onValueChange
PropData.Description: Event handler called when the pressed state of an item changes and type is "multiple".

PropData.Name: disabled
PropData.Description: Event handler called when the pressed state of an item changes and type is "multiple".

PropData.Name: rovingFocus
PropData.Description: When false, navigating through the items using arrow keys will be disabled.

PropData.Name: loop
PropData.Description: The reading direction of the toggle group. If omitted, inherits globally from DirectionProvider or assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.

EnumData.Name: type
EnumData.Description: Determines whether a single or multiple items can be pressed at a time.

EnumData.Name: orientation
EnumData.Description: The orientation of the component, which determines how focus moves: horizontal for left/right arrows and vertical for up/down arrows.

EnumData.Name: dir
EnumData.Description: The orientation of the component, which determines how focus moves: horizontal for left/right arrows and vertical for up/down arrows.

PropData.Name: asChild
PropData.Description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.  Read our Composition guide for more details.

PropData.Name: value
PropData.Description: A unique value for the item.

PropData.Name: disabled
PropData.Description: When true, prevents the user from interacting with the item.
